dmca.title: PROBABLY SHOULDN'T BE PUBLISHED: Sender thinks he's talking to google?
dmca.body:
I am writing to demand that defamatory URL (http://mentai.2ch.net/edu/kako/992/992656947.html) that appears on ?google in Japan? (http://www.google.co.jp/) immediately and permanently be removed from the following URL:
http://www.google.co.jp/search?hl=ja&q=%E6%B5%85%E6%B2%BC%E8%8C%82&btnG=Google+%E6%A4%9C%E7%B4%A2&lr=
Specifically, an anonymous user has since at least February 24, 2008 connected to your google search.
This false and defamatory statement has violated human rights and individual dignity and caused critical psychological disorders for my family.  My daughter has experienced school bullying and been reluctant to go to a school because of that URL.
I demand that Google permanently block or remove the following URL (http://mentai.2ch.net/edu/kako/992/992656947.html) to appear from the following http://www.google.co.jp/search?hl=ja&q=%E6%B5%85%E6%B2%BC%E8%8C%82&btnG=Google+%E6%A4%9C%E7%B4%A2&lr
 
Very truly yours,
Shigeru Asanuma
